title: (x) Two chunky sans serifs on business cards - ITC Eras, Futura {Yves, Tiff}
content:
Hey guys, need some mo' help ID-ing these two chunky sans types.

GRACIAS!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130105045625im_/http:/typophile.com/files/businesscards_3488.jpg)
author: Dubtron9000

comments.content: The bottom one is ITC Eras. The top one reminds me of the heavy weights of Antique Olive.
RAINLINE looks like Futura Extra Bold squooshed from the waist down.

That could be caused by bad image scaling. See the 't' in "Forrest" and the 'r' in "Marcato".

- Lex
